function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unidentified symbols and characters could indicate potential security risks or data corruption.","Impact":"Potential for data loss or corruption, compromised system security, or inability to interpret text.","Mitigation":"Use secure and verified encoding and decoding algorithms, regular data backups, and avoid executing unknown or untrusted code.","Technologies":"Secure data encryption, regular backups, antivirus and anti-malware software, input validation and sanitization.","People":"Users, system administrators, cybersecurity professionals.","Owner":"System administrators, cybersecurity professionals."}]}
